Fulfill Contract.name: Fulfill Contract
Fulfill Contract.flavor: Singling out an enemy ensures your attacks land with the desired accuracy, so you can reap the rewards for completing your mission.
Fulfill Contract.trigger: Using an at-will attack power, you make an attack roll against an enemy that is granting combat advantage to you.
Fulfill Contract.effect: You gain a +3 power bonus to the attack roll, and the enemy takes 2d8 extra damage if the attack hits. If the attack bloodies the enemy or drops it to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + one-half your level.

Certainty of Death.name: Certainty of Death
Certainty of Death.flavor: A vicious attack from a hidden position gives you the opportunity to eliminate the target with a single strike.
Certainty of Death.trigger: You hit a bloodied enemy with an at-will attack power, and you are hidden from it.
Certainty of Death.effect: The triggering attack deals 5d8 extra damage to the enemy, and it grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Next to Die.name: Next to Die
Next to Die.flavor: You single out a target, pursuing it until it is no more.
Next to Die.effect: Choose one enemy that you can see within 5 squares of you. Until the end of the encounter, you gain combat advantage against that enemy, and you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than it until it drops to 0 hit points. In addition, whenever the enemy moves more than 2 squares on its turn, you can shift up to 2 squares as a free action.
